author: Lord G

text:
Whoa, they were launch titles? My bad. I knew only about SMW and Super Castlevania, I didn't know about Zelda ;o

Here in Brazil we only got up to date with Gamecube (and XBOX I guess).
author: agaifi

text:
SNES had Super Mario World, Link to the Past, Castlevania, Actraiser, and more, probably the best launch line up of any console. 

I remember this because I was 8 when it came out and slaved away under my parents making the 200 that it cost back in 1991. I still have that SNES, and it still works fine to this day (the thing is 18 years old!) and I remember going to the store and looking at all the games. I had to go with Link to the Past, but Castlevania 4 was #3. Great game
author: MattJRo

text:
Launch title for the SNES. And yet one of my favorite games. Maybe my favorite Castlevania.

Think about it though, few launch titles are that good.
